title: Ropes & Roses
description: Dominant Desires is nine stories of Kinky goodness. An overall theme of BDSM prevails through most of the pieces. Roses are prominent in Bed of Roses and Bound in Roses. A Priest figures into Bless Me Father. Hot, sensual, erotic sex is the mainstay of every story. You'll want to read Dominant Desires: Ropes & Roses with your partner, often.
author: R.C. Graham
